description:
Urashima wants his brothers Nagasone and Hachisuka to get along better, so he asks them to cook for him. Meanwhile, Yamanbagiri follows the newly-arrived Sohayanotsurugi to find out how he can be so cheerful even though he`s a copy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: May: What I Can Do Because I`m Me
皐月 俺だから, できること
